nodes.text: Colu was the primary star of the Colu system.

Colu was a large white A-type. It had six orbits and an asteroid belt that included Clak'dor I, Clak'dor II, Clak'dor III, Clak'dor IV, Clak'dor V, Clak'dor VI and Clak'dor VII. In 8000 BBY Colu expanded enough to destroy Clak'Dor I.
Colu is also the name of a planet in Superman's comics.
